casebody.data:
STATE
v.
John NORMAN. No. 567P04-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 2, 2006. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 15th day of February 2006 by Defendant for Relief:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 2nd day of March 2006."
